description: Google Pixel 9a debuted globally and in India on Wednesday as the latest addition to Google’s midrange lineup. Powered by last year’s Tensor G4 chip, it boasts a 48-megapixel main camera and a 5,100mAh battery that is claimed to deliver over 30 hours of usage per charge. Available in four colours, the Pixel 9a runs Android 15 and is guaranteed seven years of OS and security updates, ensuring long-term support for users.
title: Google Pixel 9a With 48-Megapixel Rear Camera, Tensor G4 Chip Launched in India: Price, Specifications

description: Honor 400 series, which is expected to launch in May, may include a Lite variant. While nothing is official, the Honor 400 Lite has surfaced online via an ecommerce website. The listing showcases the design and specifications of the handset.
title: Honor 400 Lite Design, Key Features Surface Online Via Regional Online Retail Listing

description: Apple had originally planned to make the upcoming iPhone 17 Air its first portless phone with wireless charging support and cloud data syncing. The brand, however, reportedly backed off the idea considering potential concerns from European Union regulators. A new report suggests that dropping the USB Type-C port for a completely portless phone would in fact be legal.
title: iPhone Without USB Type-C Port May Become Reality as EU Reportedly Gives Green Light to Apple

description: HP introduced refreshed versions of its EliteBook 8 series enterprise laptops at its annual Amplify conference. These models include replaceable keyboards, an extra USB Type-C port, and larger batteries. Additionally, HP unveiled four new OmniBook X models powered by Intel Core Ultra (Series 2) processors or AMD Ryzen AI CPUs, moving away from Qualcomm’s Snapdragon X chips.
title: HP EliteBook 8 Series and OmniBook X Series Enterprise Laptops Refreshed With Intel, AMD Chips

description: HP announced its Omen 16 Slim gaming laptop at the HP Amplify 2025 conference on Tuesday. As the name suggests, the new laptop comes with a slimmer design when compared to the standard Omen 16 model. The laptop can be configured with up to Intel Core Ultra 9 285H processors (Intel Arrow Lake CPUs) and Nvidia GeForce RTX 5070 laptop GPU. The brand has also refreshed its Omen Transcend 14 gaming laptop with the same CPU and GPU as the Omen 16 Slim.
title: HP Omen 16 Slim Gaming Laptop With Nvidia GeForce RTX 5070 GPU Unveiled; Omen Transcend 14 Refreshed

description: Hyundai Motor India Ltd (HMIL) will hike prices of its vehicles by up to three percent effective in April 2025. The price increase is due to rising input costs, increased commodity prices and higher operational expenses, amongst other reasons, it said.
title: Hyundai Motor India to Hike Vehicle Prices by Up to Three Percent From April

description: Vodafone Idea is exploring ways to bring satellite communication to India. The mobile operator made the disclosure after Indian stock exchanges sought a clarification on its stock move.
title: India's Vodafone Idea Explores Partnership with Elon Musk's Starlink

description: Naughty Dog is reportedly taking inspiration from Elden Ring for its next game, Intergalactic: The Heretic Prophet. At the time of the reveal, the studio promised its newest franchise for the PS5 would offer the “deepest gameplay in Naughty Dog's history.” An industry insider, however, has claimed that Intergalactic will take notes from FromSoftware’s action-RPG phenomenon.
title: Naughty Dog Reportedly Taking Inspiration From Elden Ring for Intergalactic: The Heretic Prophet

description: Nvidia’s CEO Jensen Huang address concerns that the cost of AI computing is spiraling out of control. At the event, Huang unveiled more powerful chips and related technology that he said would provide a clearer payoff to customers.
title: Nvidia Looks to Expand AI Reign With New Chips, Personal Supercomputers

description: Samsung is expected to introduce the Galaxy Tab Active 5 Pro soon. While previous leaks and reports have suggested several key features of the purported tablet, it has now appeared on a popular benchmarking website. The listing suggests the chipset, RAM and operating system details of the anticipated tablet.
title: Samsung Galaxy Tab Active 5 Pro with Snapdragon 7s Gen 3 SoC Spotted on Geekbench

description: Motorola Edge 60 Fusion is teased to launch in India soon. Motorola is yet to announce an exact release date for the phone, but a new leak suggests a possible launch date and its specifications. The upcoming phone is tipped to run on the MediaTek Dimensity 7400 chipset. It is likely to boast a 50-megapixel dual rear camera unit and a 5,500mAh battery.
title: Motorola Edge 60 Fusion India Launch Date Leaked; Said to Get MediaTek Dimensity 7400 SoC, 5,500mAh Battery

description: Core 2 Duo and Core Time 2 smartwatches that run on open-sourced PebbleOS have been unveiled. They are currently available for pre-order in the US and will start shipping later this year. The Core 2 Duo has a black-and-white display, while the Core Time 2 sports a 64-colour display. They are based on the Pebble 2 and Pebble Time 2, respectively, but offer modern features.
title: PebbleOS-Powered Core 2 Duo and Core Time 2 Smartwatches Unveiled; Pre-Orders Go Live

description: Realme Buds Air 7 have been launched in India. The TWS earphones are claimed to offer a battery life of up to 13 hours on a single charge. They are said to provide a total playback time of up to 52 hours with the case. The earphones have an IP55 dust and splash resistance rating. They support dual-device connectivity, LHDC 5.0 audio codec, up to 52dB active noise cancellation (ANC) and carry 12.4mm brass drivers.
title: Realme Buds Air 7 With Up to 13 Hours Battery Life Launched in India: Price, Features

description: Apple introduced a standalone Passwords app last year with the iOS 18 update, replacing the previous option in the Settings menu. However, it had a critical security flaw, leaving users vulnerable to phishing attacks from attackers on the same Wi-Fi network. Apple has now revealed that the issue was resolved three months after iOS 18 was launched.
title: Apple's Passwords App Had a Security Flaw That Exposed Users to Phishing Attacks for Three Months

description: Alphabet will buy Israeli startup Wiz for about $32 billion (roughly Rs. 2,76,784 crore), marking its biggest deal ever. With this, Wiz will become part of Google's cloud unit and strengthen the company's efforts in cybersecurity solutions that companies use to remove critical risks.
title: Alphabet to Buy Wiz for $32 Billion in Its Biggest Deal to Boost Cloud Security

description: India's Ministry of Consumer Affairs and Meta have come together to launch a consumer awareness campaign called "Be an Empowered Consumer". The initiative, unveiled by Consumer Affairs Minister Pralhad Joshi and Meta's Chief Global Affairs Officer Joel Kaplan aims to enhance digital literacy and protection for online consumers.
title: India's Ministry of Consumer Affairs Partners with Meta on Digital Consumer Protection Initiative

description: iPhone 17 series is still months away from launch but that has not stopped the rumour mill from churning out details about next year's iPhone 18 series. Most recently, a well-known analyst stated that iPhone 18 Pro models will come with Apple's second-generation modem. The iPhone maker introduced its first-ever in-house modem, C1, with the iPhone 16e.
title: iPhone 18 Pro Models to Get Apple's Second-Generation 5G Modem: Report

description: Ubisoft is banking on the success of Assassin's Creed Shadows to fight its way out of financial troubles.  The company's founding Guillemot family has also been exploring talks with Tencent and other investors on a buyout deal that would let them preserve control.
title: Ubisoft Faces Make-or-Break Moment with 'Assassin's Creed Shadows'

description: Realme P3 Ultra 5G was unveiled alongside the Realme P3 5G in India on Wednesday. The Ultra model is powered by a MediaTek Dimensity 8350 Ultra SoC, while the base variant comes with a Snapdragon 6 Gen 4 chipset. Both smartphones are powered by 6,000mAh batteries with the Ultra variant offering support for 80W AI bypass charging technology.
title: Realme P3 Ultra 5G With MediaTek Dimensity 8350 Ultra SoC Launched in India Alongside Realme P3 5G

description: Split Fiction developer Hazelight Studios has already started work on its next project. Just two weeks after the release of its latest co-op adventure, the Stockholm-based studio has confirmed its next game is in the very early stages of development.
title: Split Fiction Developer Hazelight Studios Has Already Started Work on Its Next Game, Director Says

description: Market analysts predict heightened volatility in the crypto market in the coming days. Bitcoin continues to experience minor price fluctuations around the $83,000 mark (roughly Rs. 71.8 lakh). On Wednesday, March 19, Ether recorded slight gains but struggled to surpass the $2,000 (Rs. 1.73 lakh) level. Meanwhile, altcoins like Ripple, Cardano, and Dogecoin faced losses alongside Bitcoin.
title: Crypto Price Today: Bitcoin Steady at $83,000, Altcoins See Mixed Moves Amid Market Fluctuations

description: Google's Pixel 10 series is expected to debut this year, with the company's Tensor G5 chip. Google is expected to collaborate with Taiwan-based TSMC for production of the Tensor G5 chipset. Ahead of the Pixel 10 launch, details about several Samsung-designed component set to be replaced in the Tensor G5 chip have emerged online.
title: Google Pixel 10 Series' Tensor G5 Chip to Arrive With Several Changes, Including Custom Camera ISP: Report

description: Zepto has partnered with Apple to offer doorstep delivery of Apple products in India. The quick product delivery firm announced its collaboration with the iPhone maker on Tuesday. With this partnership, buyers in select locations can order iPhone, iPad, Apple Watch, AirPods, and other accessories on the instant delivery platform.
title: Zepto Starts Quick Doorstep Delivery of iPhone, iPad and Other Apple Products in India

description: Oppo F29 5G series will be unveiled in India on March 20. The company previously confirmed several features of the base Oppo F29 5G and the F29 Pro 5G, including design and colour options. Now, the chipset, battery, and charging details of the handsets have been revealed. Oppo has also listed the RAM and storage configurations of the phones on its official microsite.
title: Oppo F29 5G, Oppo F29 Pro 5G Key Features Revealed Ahead of March 20 India Launch

description: Vivo X200 Ultra could soon arrive as the latest variant in the Vivo X200 lineup. While the launch date is not official, a new leak has hinted at the phone's colour options and key specifications. The Vivo X200 Ultra is tipped to come in three colourways and could boast a 2K resolution display. It is likely to feature a triple rear camera unit, comprising a 200-megapixel sensor.
title: Vivo X200 Ultra Colour Options Leaked; Tipped to Get 2K Resolution Display

description: The BWA has launched a new initiative called the “Crypto SAFE Campaign” to educate users on responsible investing patterns and the importance of Do Your Own Research (DYOR). For the next three months, BWA and its member firms will be using social networking platforms to engage with people on crypto safety and cybersecurity awareness.
title: BWA Launches 100-Day Crypto SAFE Campaign to Educate Web3 Investors on Risks
